MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G77 Postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.32PM. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a blown fuse. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.20AM on 13th December 2020.
